parameters.name: NewResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the new resource group. You can view the available resource groups in the Resource Management console.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region in which the WAF instance is deployed. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou**: Chinese mainland.
*   **ap-southeast-1**: outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the protected object that you want to manage.

parameters.name: ResourceManagerResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud resource group.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The resource type. Set the value to defenseresource.
